outputs.output_descr:
The objective of the proposed NCSA project for Cape Verde is to assess the capacity development needs for the implementation of the Rio Conventions. On basis of this assessment, the sub-objective is to conceive a capacity development strategy for global environmental management, in accordance with the PANA II objectives and methodologies, covering the individual, institutional and systemic dimensions and considering the impetus towards national decentralization. The project will result in a plan to develop national capacities in order to integrate the content of the three Conventions within the various development initiatives in the country, in particular through PANA II implementation.
output 2. The capacity development needs that are common to the three thematic areas and to each of them individually are examined.

project_descr: Assess the capacity development needs for global environmental management  towards national decentralization.
